extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Originally released in June 1995, Ice Age was the first true stand-alone expansion, with 383 cards. It’s compatible with the basic game, but contains enough land and spells to play on its own.

Each booster box contains 36 booster packs of 15 random cards.

Each display contains 10 starter decks.
Each starter deck contains 60 cards and a rulebook.
